changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.resource_product AS SELECT rp.id, r.name AS resource, rel.name AS relationship, p.name AS product, rp.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, rp.update_date FROM ruleform.resource_product rp JOIN ruleform.resource r ON rp.resource = r.id JOIN ruleform.relationship rel ON rp.relationship = rel.id JOIN ruleform.product p ON rp.product = p.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON rp.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.resource up ON rp.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.resource_product OWNER TO core;
